title: This Week's Top Stories - Trump's Anti-Immigrant Policy, Biden's Diverse Cabinet & Drake's Candles
itunes:title: This Week's Top Stories - Trump's Anti-Immigrant Policy, Biden's Diverse Cabinet & Drake's Candles
description:
President Trump pushes a harsh immigration policy during his final weeks in office, Joe Biden builds a diverse White House cabinet, and Drake releases a line of candles that smell like him.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
